website_summaries.verdict: Buyers searching for a hair product with blended vitamins should check out this helpful supplement.
pros: Offers body nutritional ingredients for healthy, shiny hair
Many customers reported that their hair felt much stronger and thicker after taking this supplement
cons: A little expensive when compared with other hair growth options

customer_reviews.title: Fake pills
customer_reviews.text: So ordered a bottle and when I got I knew something was off about it. Do the next month I ordered directly from HAIRFINITY and the pills look totally different. Which I had figured the first bottle was bs but wasn’t sure. Don’t order from here just order directly from HAIRFINITY. You’ll notice the darker pill came from HAIRFINITY, also the bottle that came from amazon had powder residue on it because the put fake stuff in the capsule, DONT ORDER FROM HERE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Vitamins Work
customer_reviews.text: I started this product on 1/1/2019 and my hair has gotten stronger and grew a lot!! It's been more like 75 days of taking it because I would wait anywhere from 5-9 days to get my shipment in which stopped me taking them. This product definitely works!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hixon

customer_reviews.title: Miracle-worker
customer_reviews.text: After battling pcos for three almost four years now this bottle is a miracle worker! I am not sure what makes this bottle better than the other thirty i have tried but noticeably less bald and thinning spots after only three weeks. Thank you so much hair infinity for giving me my hair confidence back!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Let it grow! Let it GROOOOOOOOOW!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is our 3rd time purchasing. Really does help your hair grow significantly! When I first tried it my fro grew so fast and so high within the first month! After a few years I made a mistake and permed my hair! Did the chop again but without the help of hair infinity and I noticed my hair was growing just no were near as fast with the supplements! So here I am popping them again along with the hair oil and it's all follicles GO AND GROW!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I receive my hair grow pills April 1st this is the April part first picture May 1st is a new picture if you can see it's working my edges are coming back slowly I wish they'd come back faster but it takes time I can't wait to have my long hair back how it was when I was your hand by the year is over my hair will be long I love using this
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles baby

customer_reviews.title: I love Hairfinity!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second go at Hairfinity Vitamins. I used them for a whole year after my 3rd Big Chop. My hair grew with extreme speed and was very healthy after using the vitamins. I missed them aftet the first year, and stopped purchasing due to price. However, this year is my 3rd year after my big cut and I wanted to gain more length. So I decided that I am worth the money! Also ordering this product on Amazon allows me to skip shipping cost, and receive the product faster. I love Hairfinity!!! Would definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: I've always wanteed some magic to grow hair and this is it
customer_reviews.text: I started to see results in the first week and my hair did grow an inch, in 3 weeks, after 4 weeks it's was like 5cm from my collar bone and it was a it above before I started to take this . I'm acne prone so it was a surprise when this didn't cause any breakouts like the other reviews say. I wish I could buy 3 month supply. But no money is my life XD
customer_reviews.author: julissadantes

customer_reviews.title: Package looks suspicious
customer_reviews.text: Although I gave 5 stars....the product arrived and the inside of the bottle was very chalky looking. Other bottles that I have purchased elsewhere were clear and the vitamins had a clear coat, but this bottle looks a little suspicious. I plan to pour the pills into something else to see if maybe one of the capsules broke open and just got all over the other pills.
customer_reviews.author: 34olmes

customer_reviews.title: They made me physically sick 🙁
customer_reviews.text: I had heard soooo much about these vitamins! I couldn’t wait to try them. I read some of the side effects and I had some of them and thought they would go away (light green urine, increased appetite, etc.) I noticed that it was getting worse each week until finally as soon I would take the pill I would get sick INSTANTLY having to go to the bathroom with stomach issues and bowel movements that caused so much discomfort. I am not sure if the claims of these being fake are true but something is not right about this.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the Hairfinity Hair Vitamins for about 5 days now and I’m already noticing a difference in the look and feel of my hair! Living at a high elevation, the weather, wind and sun take a huge toll on the condition of my hair. I was looking for something that would help from the inside out. My hair is starting to look shinier, feel softer and look overall more healthy than it did before. I’m incredibly happy with these vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie L

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you these pills do grow your hair I know some people say it caused them to break out or there hair grew but it thinned out I didn't experience any of that but different results for different folks these pictures are 1 year apart
customer_reviews.author: Kinki

customer_reviews.title: Two in one!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously heard about this product so i was definitely excited to try this product as it was sent to me to test. I really like it because i was taking Biotin and B12 pills and i have substitute those products with these pills. i have continued to see new growth hear and there while taking this supplement. I have not had any signs of side effects so that is a plus for me. So far i would recommend this product to others. I am looking forward to the results i see after i have taken the entire 60 day supply.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance W.

customer_reviews.title: WATCH OUT FOR COUNTERFEIT PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: this was the second bottle I ordered from amazon because I was seeing good progress from the first bottle. It came looking dusty on the inside but I didn’t think anything of it. I’ve taken a third of the bottle and washed my hair and my hair line is receding terrible and my part is huge. I’m so upset because I have been working on making my hair healthy and longer for a long time and this just pushed back my progress. Be careful !!!! Will be sending back ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective hair supplement!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to just taking my usual biotin pills every day. I noticed some other reviews stating that the pills were hard to swallow, but I really haven't had any trouble with them. So far, my hair is looking great and it's continued to help with preventing how much mine usually falls out. If you want your hair to look healthy and full, I'd definitely say to check these out!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bailey

customer_reviews.title: May not be suitable for all
customer_reviews.text: I believe haifinity is not for everyone, I started taking hairfinity and immediately my hair started shedding really bad , falling out from the root in handfuls, all the ingredients seem to be natural but there maybe people whom the amounts of natural ingredients are to high for them, I have discontinued haifinity and my hair is getting back healthy, not for everyone, stop as soon as you notice hair fall it’s not like normal shedding, some people may have great results with it as it seem to be made of really good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JettSetter22

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bottle. I haven't broke out on my face, doesn't make you feel nauseous without eating. It's definitely made my hair grow faster than it normally does for me but everyone is different. I would definitely recommend this. I will be purchasing again soon. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product works but I do have a few dislikes. I noticed shortly after starting these vitamins my face began to breakout. I increased the amount of water I was drinking and I didn't notice any change. So I only take one a day instead of two. I also was concerned when I received the package that the powder substance from the vitamins was wasted inside the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Haiti C

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me made my hair fall out and stop growing
customer_reviews.author: Lovely ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT a paid reviewer. I have been using this product for 5-6months. When i started using it, 2 weeks later my hairdresser Saw results. I do not drink as much water as needed for healthy hair growth howsoever, these Vitamins are enough to grow and fill my hair out. I will post pictures at the company’s request as that would be a promo. If you stop using the vitamins your hair will shed. The results make you want to keep using them.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Just started using these. It does make your face breakout and your urine is intensely yellow so you MUST drink tones of water throughout the course of day. Will follow up regarding hair growth in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Shante'

customer_reviews.title: repair damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: works fast. it has only been a few days and already my hair has grown. I take 1 pill in the morning and 1 at night with a full cup of water. I did this for 1 week already and have gained 1inch in hair growth. my hair is not shedding as much, so that let's me know it is getting stronger. in areas I was thinning I can tell the hair is getting thicker. I must have for those trying to repair damaged hair.
customer_reviews.author: Viesha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product you will be amazed
customer_reviews.text: Well let me start off by saying I was a bit skeptical about this product but after about a week my hair looks shinier and feels a lot stronger. And I also noticed that it keeps from hairs falling off. I usually have a lot of hairs on my hairbrush and ever since taking this product it's been very little hair on my hairbrush thanx so much. This is a defenit five stars. If anyone is reading this trying to decide whether to buy or not take my word this is a awesome product. Buy with confidence. I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have these pills back in college 2015 took them but was not keeping up with the health of my hair. The pills do work and your hair will grow please make sure to follow directions and instructions. And drink plenty of water!!! If you are not aware of the health of your hair before taking these pills I would not recommend it because you probably won’t be able to see any kind of progress if your hair is not healthy. I’m chopped my hair off in 2017 and started all the way over. And have not found any kind of pills like these that do the same growth as this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd instance of using Hairfinity vitamins. Earlier this year I used them for about 3 months after my hair started breaking after relaxing and color . They helped my hair greatly. The breakage stopped and my hair started to become thicker and stronger. I stopped using for a long while because my hair had gotten back into a healthy state. Due to pressure problems, my hair again stared to break. I tried straight biotin and another brand of hair/skin vitamins, but they did nothing but break out my face. Since started the HairFinity vitamins again, I can see the difference for the better. Thanks HairFinity. I won't switch again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynelle P Batiste

customer_reviews.title: Has made some impact in a short time
customer_reviews.text: I have not been taking this supplement for very long, but it seems to have an impact on split ends in my beard. These split ends are itchy and annoying and it's quite nice to have some reduction of that sensation. I have also noticed that the skin under my beard seems a bit healthier and less prone to irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Landis

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 3rd bottle (3rd month) and I am loving how my hair is "healing". The below paragraph was my previous review and continue to see the results. this product was recommend to me by my hairdresser. I'm a natural blonde but have colored my hair as a very "white" blonde for about 15 years. no that I'm growing it out we've scaled back the coloring. she recommended this product specifically to help stream then my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had any results. I already had pretty long and thick hair, but it tends to get dry and shed. This year I changed up my hair care routine and this hasn’t been the case. Once I began these supplements it seems my hair became dry. Reading the reviews it may be that I received a counterfeit product as mine did have dust from the product everywhere and everything about the packaging is cheap. The capsules themselves where light in color unlike the ones pictured from the official website. Maybe this seller was conned themselves. Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Mirzilla

customer_reviews.title: Huge placebo pills
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting to buy hairfinity pills since I went natural in '09. Always was hesitant due to negative reviews. I figured I'd use quarantine to really try to cultivate my natural hair. Complete waste of money. I took two pills a day for a month and I didn't see any effect on hair growth. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: KorSoAnimated

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I finally tried this product. I will start by saying they have a strong medicine smell. My husband didn't think it was bad but I hate vitamins that have a strong smell. The smell is not enough to be a no go though. Pills were easy to swallow and have not bothered my tummy. I am looking forward to seeing the hair growth as I cut my hair really short last year. I will give an update in 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Khesi

customer_reviews.title: This is serious stuff. It's an absolute staple in my hair growth journey.
customer_reviews.text: I love Hairfinity. It really does prmote hair growth, even in places where my hair was thinning! I had a bit of heat damage, so I had to trim my hair pretty short. Bit this stuff is that truth. It's my second time purchasing and I swear by it. Definitely will continue using.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrine C.

customer_reviews.title: No after taste ,not too hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: The pills were pretty large but the taste wasn't bad and I didn't mind the texture after the pills went down. I liked the look of the bottle and the amount of pills is a good price for what you get. I've heard good things about this product and it's easy to take with food and with my other vitamins in the morning .
customer_reviews.author: stevee hutchins

customer_reviews.title: I do not have a history of headaches so it makes it easy for me to pinpoint where the headaches came from
customer_reviews.text: I started having headaches about 3 days after starting this product. I stopped after 2 weeks of taking them. I asked for a refund and they declined stating that the FDA approved the product. They also stated that i need to drink alor of water. Anyone who knows me (coworkers, family & friends) will all vouch that i drink water all day everyday! I am in the process of writing the FDA and including a copy of Brock's response so they can do further research. I do not have a history of headaches so it makes it easy for me to pinpoint where the headaches came from.
customer_reviews.author: Kea Renea

customer_reviews.title: Take a vitamin with this supplement
customer_reviews.text: I also like using this it grew my hair It’s routes very good but I had to take a multi vitamin With us but it works.But some of my hair breaking off But I continue to use these My hair grew in a week and it’s crowded I continue to use a multi vitamin If Not your hair will break off I stop using the other bottle and I bought me some Biotene my hair begins to grow
customer_reviews.author: Rocheka frankle

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement to help your hair grow!
customer_reviews.text: Hairfinity hair therapy supplement works wonders on my box dyed hair. My hair is fairly long and tends to get that dry scraggly look, these give my hair a healthier shinier look, with the added bonus of an all around good for you vitamin. Vitamins they work!
customer_reviews.author: JP Norritt

customer_reviews.title: No effect yet
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for a few days. I haven't seen much of an effect one way or the other yet, which is maybe a good sign. The package looks nice, and the pills smells okay. It'll probably take more than a few days to see any results. I'll update this in a. couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: After 10 days I noticed some growth.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait the 30 days before writing this review, however after taking these pills for just 10 days now I literally noticed some growth as well as stronger strands of hair because it just feels thicker. I'm excited to see how the growth continues for the next 20 days when I finish this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs, Lady B

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years now it's not the same thing the color was different it smell funny beware of imposters also it cause my hair fall out
customer_reviews.author: Bipolar Beauty

customer_reviews.title: I personally couldnt tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really care for this product i did read the reviews having been using for a couple of months and i personally cant tell any difference i think im going to stick with biotin ive had better luck with that ,i will say it may work better for others i do have health issues and take alot of medicine that does effect my hair
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients changed, I can not get an answer these used to work now the pills look different
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bottle I have paid for that obviously there is a change in the ingredients! It's is not working and the color of the pills/capsules are different!! I have emailed and asked if there has been a change and no one will contact me back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair bad for pimples
customer_reviews.text: These pills work I definitely notice a significant amount of hair growth after taking for 2 months. The biggest side effect I am experiencing is facial pimples when I take this product. I have cut down to one pill a day and sometimes I skip until my face clears up and as soon as I restart the pills my face breaks out again. After I finish this bottle I'm going to try something else because the breakouts are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Seeing some progress...
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews about this product, good and bad, and decided to try it for myself. I have been using them for a month and have just ordered a second month's supply only because not only I, but my hairdresser has noticed new growth. I am trying to thicken and grow hair in a couple of areas where I lost hair due to a weave. The rest of my hair is very long. I will come back and give it another review in another month after I have been using this for sixty days.
customer_reviews.author: ladyv

customer_reviews.title: My Hair Grew
customer_reviews.text: My hair is stronger, fuller, and feels healthier. After I moved from So. Cal to Colorado, I noticed my hair is drier than usual with a lot of static due to cold weather. I had a lot of break offs/fly-away. I started taking these vitamins 10 days ago and I know my hair is growing rapidly because I had to cut my bangs twice already. My hair is a lot stronger, and it feels healthier with more movement. I have color treated hair and these vitamins really worked to combat the dry fly-aways. I would recommend for anyone with dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it’s exactly like the real website !
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this at all it looks disgusting and gross . I have bought this brand before off their actual website and the pills where not messy like this at all it was very clean and didn’t look like this mess . I love these pills but I don’t think I’ll ever order them off amazon again I’m kinda scared to take them to be honest on how they look .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works, that’s all I can say. After losing my hair from chemotherapeutic treatment, a nurse recommended this product and I only used one bottle and behold my hair started growing back. It works really good!
customer_reviews.author: Kuma

customer_reviews.title: HAIR GROWTH and HAPPINESS
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and my hair always gets thicker (all over) and sheds less. Great product, drink lots of water or you will break out terribly. This time I drank so much water I only had one breakout and it went away quickly! Love it for my hair! I stand by this product and I am Black and it works for my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Roberson

customer_reviews.title: DNT Waste UR Money!!!!!! These do not Work!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is Natural, I took these pills 4 3 weeks straight, & I had to stop taking them. These pills thinned my hair out & it gave me headaches after I stopped taking them the headaches are gone & my hair is started to get thick again......I gave the other bottle away.....I ordered 2 bottles.......
customer_reviews.author: Umm Layla Mujjahid

customer_reviews.title: The Best Product !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one bottle of this and I have to say OMFG I will be buying this item again ! I will post photos when I take my braids out but no lie this stuff works ! I had a half fade and wanted to grow my hair back out on the side and when i say i can totally cornrow the right side of my head I mean it ! I will definitely buy this product again ! My hair will be down my back by the SUMMER no more lace fronts for me !
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Townsend

customer_reviews.title: May cause scalp to itch and scab.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about two weeks. I used took it in the morning with breakfast. About 4 days in I started to notice itching. About a week end it got really bad. I hadn’t changed any other hair product so I thought it may be the pills. I stopped taking the supplement about 2 weeks in after I noticed my scalp scabbing. I didn’t take long enough to notice any growth. I do know other people who have had really good results from this product. I did notice while I was watching a YouTube video that the ingredients have changed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin Greyson

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to luster, length & shine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve actually wanted to purchase these a long time ago and now that I have... I’m looking forward to the results. Your hair typically grows half an inch a month so I’m looking to see the main results towards the end of this month. My hope is that it’ll help restore shine, help produce more length and help my acne as well. The only thing is that it says it’s for a month use but it’s 30 in a bottle and you have to take 2 a day so really only half a month.
customer_reviews.author: Corea Marshae

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this purchase. I noticed new growth and that my hair had more shine to it. I am trying out another brand (cheaper) but has same ingredients. I have really thick hair, but it doesn't grow as fast as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Jlc

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: So much bad.After taking this few days when i am using shampoo or combing my hair i am loosing my hair too much.Before take this medicine i wasn’t loosing my hair that much.This is soo bad.I have alomst all of them in bottle but i m not taking this any more.
customer_reviews.author: Farjana akter

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! My hair didn’t want to grow for a while, which was a horrible experience. A friend recommended it, I’ve been taking this, and I’m already seeing a difference. You should definitely give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Healthy hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for the past 9 days and I've noticed that my hair looks and feels much healthier. I have not yet noticed any growth since it has only been 9 days. I'll edit my review in a month or so to speak on any noticed growth.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Carter

customer_reviews.title: Really works! 2nd time user
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by my trusted hairstylist of many years. I ordered a 2 month supply in 2016, and my hair grew about 2 inches, appeared stronger and visibly healthier. About a month ago, I bleached my hair and since then it is very brittle, dry, and is having a really hard time growing. I recently ordered yet another months supply. After taking Hairfinity for only 3 days, I can already see my roots coming back in (indicating growth). I love these vitamins, can always count on them!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Collins

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I tried the entire product line, shampoo, conditioner, oil, etc. I even bought the capsules and alternated between gummy and capsule. Made hair hard. No growth past what I normally see.
customer_reviews.author: SheTriedIt

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for 2 months now And I have definitely seen a difference a slight difference but it is big to me the pills are easy to swallow and don’t have a bad taste the packaging is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!️ THE PILLS ARE FAKE!!️
customer_reviews.text: I tried to give hairInfinity the benefit of the doubt, but I’m going to have to agree with some of the reviewer‘s that this brand has fake pills not only did I lose my hair, the pills are not the same. I’m going to contact whoever I need to contact. Because I did exactly what the bottled said, and yet I received more hair shedding than I ever seen in my life. Now I have to cut it all off because this brand, or Amazon, or not buying from the SOLE distributor !!️ I AM ANGRY !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanel T.

customer_reviews.title: Helps me fight hair thinning with age
customer_reviews.text: I'm 28 years old and have noticed that my hair has started to thin a little bit as I get older. After taking this I feel like I'm starting to get some of my hair back. Obviously time will tell, but I have caught my hair in the mirror or corner of my eye strike me as looking fuller and more luscious. I also have a beard and it has been feeling fuller and the texture slightly softer. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Webber

customer_reviews.title: Great results in such a short time worthy of trying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these vitamins because I wanted longer hair of course I took them twice a day until they were gone I did notice my hair looking fuller but not longer but I only took them for a month I didn't have the problems that most were complaining about which was acne I think if your skin is prone to acne then you're more likely to have a breakout due to the high amount of biotin in this product but overall its a great product to use.
customer_reviews.author: miztarie

customer_reviews.title: To hairinfinity and beyond my shoulders I hope.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love how this product is packaged and looks. The ingredients are put together with thoughtful innovation and a health focused detection. I can't wait to see how they work with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne M.

customer_reviews.title: Hairinfinity
customer_reviews.text: This product does appear to make my hair feel thicker. It changes the texture as well. My hair feels more coarse
customer_reviews.author: Punkie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these vitamins were fairly easy to swallow (for a multi-vitamin) and didn't have much taste to it. Over the course of taking the pills, I noticed that I had less hair loss. I will definitely continue taking then to see more hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pill Capsule Coloring Does Not Match Last Product Order - Replacement Order
customer_reviews.text: My first order the interior seal was broken open and the exterior seal was in place. Not HAPPY with this replacement order!!! This was a replacement order, the pill capsules do not match my previous orders. This was to come from the Brock Beauty distributor as I have ordered in the past. I am concerned this product is not the same as the product I have been taking. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Benita

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell
customer_reviews.text: Not sure just yet as I have only been using for a week but I did notice a few capsules broke open and there was alot of powder residue which I'm sure is normal but it shipped fast and everything was sealed. I will say drink lots of water there pretty big!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wright

customer_reviews.title: Check expiration date before you open it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! Just picked up the package with the vitamins which expired more than 4 years (!!!) ago. How the hell is this even possible? Have never seen anything like this in my entire life. If you order, pay very close attention to expiration date!
customer_reviews.author: Andrii Demko

customer_reviews.title: Expected more growth by 3rd bottle
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd or 4th bottle. Haven't seen major hair growth or improvement, but I am starting to see regrowth to a patch of hair breakage that I have. Expected to see more for the 3rd or 4th bottle, but I will continue taking to see what will happen.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best I been purchasing throught the company it takes longer ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best I been purchasing throught the company it takes longer to get from them, but received quickly form amazon. This product has help my hair grown healthy with less shedding I have been natural for 5 years. When my hair is shedding and nt growing I go back to this product and can tell the changes within a week or two always my go to hair vitamin. Love the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it:)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for almost 3 months and I like it. While it usually takes time for products like this to work and show its effectiveness, I think it's having an effect on my hair. So far I like it and I'm going to continue taking it for as long as I think it's having an effect.
customer_reviews.author: Janin Grigory

customer_reviews.title: From barely there to hair everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was horrified when my hair suddenly fell out from stress, illness, and probably poor maintenance on my part. After much research, I tried Hairfinity. Within a month, hair started growing everywhere - and I do mean everywhere. Of course it takes time to see length on my head but my braids grew out pretty fast and I have to do "body maintenance" more than I had in the past. I plan to continue using the product for 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible. The vitamins are cheaply made in a large capsule form. I was getting severe migraines. As soon as I stop talking the vitamins the migraines stopped. I was so excited to go on this journey of hair growth using this product and found they weren’t for me. I was able to return the remaining left capsules and received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: HairFinity is a great product , recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I amaze with these pills , HairFinity has my hair look better , my hair was a desastre had to cut it out short , I start using these like almost 2,week and I could see a difference in a hair it growing and my hair shine looks healthy, they are a great product will buy them again 👏🏼👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Vidalina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best hair growth supplement.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re having a growth issues these vitamins are the way to go! I have acne prone skin, they didn’t break me out and I saw a difference in about three weeks (even with missing a few days). I normally take two pills at night right before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to get my hair to grow some more. It didn’t work for me at all. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keela R

customer_reviews.title: I'm ready to go on the 3-year or more Journey with Hairfinity
customer_reviews.text: It's been less than a week now I love the way it makes me feel energetic and I feel like my food digest better when I take the vitamins this product is amazing I've only used it for a couple of weeks I will give another review after my second bottle and when I start seeing results so far my metabolism is great with this thank you so much hair finity
customer_reviews.author: badd becky

customer_reviews.title: Review on hair and nail growth in a month
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! I started December 1st 2016. I decided to cut off my dead ends ( 2 inches) so I could start of clean. Today janurary 1st 2017 my hair has grown at least an inch. Not only did it help my hair it also helped my nail grow faster and stronger too. I take one when I first wake up and one right before I go to bed. The first week of using it my hair did shed but not too much. And I didn't have much acne problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I decided to grow my hair back and I've heard beautiful things about hairfinity and it has been growing great ...
customer_reviews.text: I cut my hair off and regret it. so I decided to grow my hair back and I've heard beautiful things about hairfinity and it has been growing great for me. Hoping to be at the length that I want by summer time.
customer_reviews.author: LBlove

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: These pills do grow your hair but be advised you must drink a lot of water or you’re going to break out depending on your skin type
customer_reviews.author: Prettyredtricia

customer_reviews.title: They actually do work!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly started to notice a difference in my hair after 2 1/2 weeks of taking them. Absolutely love them my hair looks much more healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Really works but...
customer_reviews.text: This product works! my hair grew an inch in a month,which was great. However, I began experiencing severe palpitations that landed me in the doctors office. The biotin in the vitamins is a high dose which may cause some people to experience side effects like palpitations. It really works for growing hair and nails. But use with caution. I would have given this product 5 stars iif I didn't have that negative experience, because it did work.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's working
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product and I am unsure if it's working or not. I haven't had any kind of side effects from taking it, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars as other products I've tried have really upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: AWeare

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I have been taking for two weeks now and have noticed my hair is thicker but haven't noticed that it's any longer. Usually taking any vitamins are harsh on my stomach, but I have had no issues taking these (with food). I will continue to use and look forward to the long term results!
customer_reviews.author: kcr9

customer_reviews.title: Can't Wait!
customer_reviews.text: So excited about taking this product. Biotin has many benefits for both the hair and nails! I am already seeing it in my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ritzman

customer_reviews.title: My mom and sister love these, but I'm allergic.
customer_reviews.text: I myself am allergic to these and other biotin containing vitamins, but I order these for my mom every month and they come out cheaper on Amazon with the free shipping. They are helping my mom with her thinning hair and her hair is growing thicker and longer again. If you don't have allergens you should definitely try Hairfinity. I hate that I can't use them myself, but they break my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Lakea C

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Standard sized pill - easy to swallow without having a panic attack. However this did absolutely nothing for my hair
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Keel

customer_reviews.title: This products really works. But the drawback is "only ...
customer_reviews.text: This products really works. But the drawback is "only on existing hair". Hair Grows longer, but no regrowth. So if you are looking for length, do buy it. Just do not look for new hair growth. It there is new growth, it is not notable on my scalp. And of course, this is a product to be taken for a life time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me not sure if they're the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these did nothing for me but when my mother had bought these from the original site and gave me a bottle to try the pills worked wonders not sure if the pills from here are legit in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: margina

customer_reviews.title: Helped my hair grow
customer_reviews.text: Helped my hair grow back after a hair cut. I have been using it for some time. But it has started to mess with my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: No flavor, huge plus
customer_reviews.text: The pills were very easy to swallow and had no flavor when I placed them in my mouth. They came very quickly and I’m having no problems at all adding them to my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Soleau

customer_reviews.title: I honestly do not see any difference in my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do not see any difference in my hair since taking these vitamins. I have almost finished the bottle and maybe it takes longer, but at the price they are, I do not intend to order more. I will just keep taking my multi-vitamins and try to include more natural foods that help the hair and nails.
customer_reviews.author: alrth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These pills really work . I got into the habit of taking them regularly. I got my hair braided and within 2 weeks I had so much new growth . I did experience a little acne but we are also wearing mask and it’s hot outside so the vitamins may or may not have contribute to the break out . Overall your hair will definitely grow in length and become fuller .
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Product returned didn’t see results
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was overpriced and I didn’t see any improvement. I returned it. It doesn’t mean it’s not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawanda McNeil

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin got me on these and they definitely make a difference in my hair. It's fuller and softer, will be continuing to use them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Krisha L.

customer_reviews.title: Really like these
customer_reviews.text: Most vitamins make me feel bad but these don’t. I have been looking for a hair supplement for quite some time. I’m glad I got these! Also, will try other products
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins have been working great so far. I've been taking them for a few weeks and my hair is going stronger and faster. I'm definitely going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Darcey

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were too expensive and not gonna work but my nails have grown and stayed long for weeks now!!!! I work in healthcare (ER) so I was my hands ALOT, I’ve been doing dishes by hand with this pandemic to save money and they haven’t broken! Crazy how they work BUT THEY DO! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Less hair in my brush!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a big difference in my hair not shedding so much. I was getting really worried whenever I would clean my brush there would be a lot of hair left and now there's almost nothing! My nails are not as brittle as they used to be! I will definitely be buying another bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Loving my hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love,love, love my hair. I tried this product, reccommended by my stylist. I've tried other products in the past for (hair, skin, nails), but these truly do work. My hair is healthier and has grown. I was almost convinced that my hormones for hair growth were dead. A must try!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had good results by using this product. I have used it for 3 months at my hairdresser's suggestion. My hair is great and my nails Are strong. I was using 5000 mg of biotine before switching to this product. I did not get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Bial

customer_reviews.title: My hair is growing
customer_reviews.text: They do have a slight unfortunate taste. But it’s really not that bad. Other than that this product works great and I’ve been taking it for years. My hair has definitely grown and become less brittle as I do tend to use a lot of heat products on it.
customer_reviews.author: Britaney

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken these pills years ago and have seen results. The key is continuously take the pills for long term results. I finally got around to ordering these pills again and have subscribed so I get a new bottle every 7 weeks. I’m excited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hairfinity Hair Vitamins - Scientifically Formulated with Biotin, Amino Acids, and a Vitamin Supplement That Helps Support Hair Growth - Vegan - 60 Veggie Capsules (1 Month Supply)
feature_bullets: UNIQUE FORMULA - A blend of bioactive vitamins, minerals and nutrients. Includes 2500mcg Biotin which promotes growth and maintenance of existing hair and nails.

EXCLUSIVE CAPILSANA COMPLEX - Provides the hair with it’s naturally occurring building blocks through the strengthening amino acids in Hydrolyzed Collagen, sulfur-containing MSM for vitality, and hair boosting Horsetail with silica.
HAIRFINITY SUPPLEMENTS - Suitable for women and men. Fills in the gaps left by your regular diet to provide your body with the nutrition it needs for healthy hair.
TARGETED TREATMENT - Each ingredient in HAIRFINITY Healthy Hair Vitamins was specifically chosen for the special role it plays in helping create the ideal environment for healthy hair to thrive.
These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. Manufacturer Warranty Included If Purchased From Brock Beauty.
